title: Bug 43394ImageAnalyzer example failed to read PNG file.
description: Bug 43394ImageAnalyzer example failed to read PNG file.
OB: I attempted to feed the attached file to the image analyzer example and got an error dialog thatsaid "Error loading file ... i/o error (java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundException: 0):java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundException: 0".Suspect this is a problem with the PNG reader.
SR: I attempted to feed the attached file to the image analyzer example and got an error dialog thatsaid "Error loading file ... i/o error (java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundException: 0):java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundException: 0".Suspect this is a problem with the PNG reader.
